    Method
    Description
    private TimerTask
    MainServerController.TCPTimeoutTask(MainServerController controller, SocketClient client)
    Creates a timeout task for a SocketClient in its setup state, closing the connection and removing them from any list in case they don't setup in time.
    private TimerTask
    MainServerController.timeoutTask(MainServerController controller, ClientDescriptor client)
    Creates a timeout task for any ClientDescriptor, if the ClientDescriptor doesn't send a ping before it expires, task runs and disconnects the ClientDescriptor.
